# init(forURL:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a new drag item preview with a URL.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(forURL url: URL)
```

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(for url: URL)
```

## Parameters

- **url**: An Internet address referencing a remote resource, such as a webpage.

## Return Value

A drag preview for a URL.

## Discussion

This method creates a drag item preview of the URL. The URL preview is a one-line, textual representation that might not show the full URL string. Don’t use a file URL.

## Initializing a drag item preview

- **init(view:)**: Initializes a new drag item preview with a view, using the default appearance parameters.
- **init(view:parameters:)**: Initializes a new drag item preview with a view and with a set of appearance parameters.
- **init(forURL:title:)**: Initializes a drag item preview with a URL and title.
